kWL

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • kWL.Helpers

  • public class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpers is a class of static helper methods of various utility. Currently, I am considering moving some/all of the methods from the Representation class to this class or the opposite (From the Representation class to here) which is less likely.

      • ReadObjectFromFile

        public static java.lang.Object ReadObjectFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Reads a serialized Java Object that was written to the hard drive and returns it.
        Parameters:
        filePath - a string that is the path to the file that is to be read.
        Returns:
        Object a java class instance that is simply casted as an "Object".
